name: GPT-4o Mini Search Preview
description: GPT-4o Mini Search Preview is a cost-efficient variant optimized for web search queries, with direct access to live web data at a lower token cost.
notes: Dual pricing structure: $25 per 1K searches plus standard GPT-4o Mini token rates ($0.15/$0.6 per 1M tokens) and additional $2 per 1M search tokens. Supports geolocation-based search customization.
